inclusion.criterion: Presence of corneal ulcer measuring > 2mm in vertical and horizontal dimensions at presentation (epithelial defect and signs of stromal inflammation)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Microbiologic evidence of fungus on smear and or culture media

inclusion.criterion: Willing to give appropriate informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of corneal ulcer measuring > 2mm in vertical and horizontal dimensions at presentation (epithelial defect and signs of stromal inflammation)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Microbiologic evidence of fungus on smear and or culture media

inclusion.criterion: Willing to return for all the follow up visits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with impending, or actual perforation or bilateral corneal ulcer or scleral involvement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of bacterial, parasitic or viral infection or co-infection
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to the study medication (drug or preservative)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is experiencing worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy. They have undergone XRT to the neck and RAI ablation.
